availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Sarah Moore Guinn. Father of Nancy Guinn, Allen Guinn, Margaret Guinn, Elizabeth Guinn, James Guinn, Martha Guinn, Effa Guinn, William Guinn, Samuel Guinn, Mary Guinn, and Nancy Guinn. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1850. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 43B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 336.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Arkansas, Crawford County, Shepherd, p. 238A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994029, Breathitt County Births.
"John Guinn (1822-1898)," Find A Grave, Memorial #42470098, accessed June 21, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/42470098/john-guinn.
